scripts.start: npm run js -- -d -w & npm run css -- -w -v & npm run static -- -w &  http-server dist
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/* && npm run static && npm run js -- -p & npm run css -- -u cssnano
scripts.css: postcss --no-map -u postcss-import -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer -u postcss-sorting -o dist/index.css src/css/index.css
